alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Callahan and northeastern Taylor Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Potosi, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Baird, Rowden, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, Admiral and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 293 and 317. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Texas.
